title: Ambient Game Sound Effects
description: The sound stage is set for an immersive listening experience sending your audience adrift in the ambiance of warm and colorful game play environments.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Video Demo

Like legendary titles Spyro the Dragon and Crash Bandicoot, Ambient Game is designed to convey the cozy, family-time, popular game sounds that seasoned users recognize and new generation players love. 600+ scintillating handcrafted sounds.

Ambient Game is an immersive listening experience that will send your audience adrift in the ambiance of warm and friendly game play environments. Watch your audience respond as they engage with the worlds of fantasy you create in audio. Featuring 600+ shimmers, glistens, auras, magic keys, pick ups, angelic coins, trinket treasures, awards, buffs, potions, liquids, items, UI, player actions, object breaks, power ups, and more

Ambient Game is a sound effects library for producers that demand uncompromising quality and authenticity in audio and sound effects production. Ready to use out of the box (RTU-OTB), all files in 44.1k 16bit and splendid for video, mobile app, game or theatrical performances - any project that needs some upbeat ambient SFX to create soundscapes that are sure to connect your audience and your media experience. Fast direct download in .WAV files.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 603 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
  • Immersive listening experience
  • Family time popular sounds
  • Perfect for Mobile Games
  • Tags: Sound Effects, Sound Library, SFX, Game Sounds
  • Genre: Ambient, Fantasy, Cartoon, Scroller, Game FX
  • Inspired by hit games like Spyro the Dragon and Crash Bandicoot

Number of Audio Waves: 603

Number of Audio Cues: 603

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 17m

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: User Manual

Important/Additional Notes:
